DOC.brief_summary: Study design : Open , randomize , cross-over , monocentric , control , prospective Applied Medical Devices : FX CorDiax 60 ( high-flux ) , FX 60 ( high-flux ) Patients : 30 adult chronic hemodialysis patient Treatment : Each patient treat post-dilution online hemodiafiltration dialyzer type . Study objective : Intraindividual comparison removal rate urea , phosphate , ß2-microglobulin ( ß2-m ) , myoglobin , prolactin , alpha1-microglobulin alpha1-acidglycoprotein albumin loss different dialyzer membrane post-dilution online hemodiafiltration . Primary variable : Removal rate myoglobin Secondary variable : Removal rate urea , phosphate , ß2-microglobulin ( ß2-m ) , prolactin , alpha1-microglobulin alpha1-acidglycoprotein Safety variable : Hematocrit , albumin loss Sample Size : 30 subject
DOC.criteria: Patients treat post dilution online HDF least three month . Patients reach dialysis dose ( Kt/V ) least 1.2 last two monthly check , Patients stable anticoagulation anemia management , Patients clinically stable outlined medical history patient , base judgment principal investigator , Patients regular thrice weekly HDF schedule , Patients good vascular access ( fistula graft ) enable easy insertion needle suitable effective blood flow ( > 300 ml/min ) , Patients able understand nature requirement clinical investigation give write informed consent , Patients age 18 year old . Patients meet inclusion criterion , Patients active HBV , HCV , HIV infection , Patients severely malnourish patient judge principal investigator , Patients know suspect allergy trial product relate product , Patients abuse nonlegal drug alcohol ( defined average daily intake one liter beer per day equivalent amount alcohol beverage ) , Patients diagnose current active malignant disease , Patients participate simultaneously another clinical investigation clinical investigation last month , Patients uncooperative .
